thread.title: Chrissy Teigen thanks supportive fans during infertility battle
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen thanks supportive fans during infertility battle | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Chrissy Teigen thanks supportive fans during infertility battle
text:
Other Articles 'Ailing' Kim Zolciak shares 'recovering' photo from hospital Bar Refaeli weds Adi Ezra in beautiful ' Jewish' ceremony This time Veena Malik blessed with 'baby girl' Chrissy Teigen, who recently opened up about her infertility battle, thanked fans for their support during a difficult time.
The 29-year-old model took to Twitter and wrote, “Regarding the IVF business, I have never gotten so many kind, encouraging words in my life,” reports E! Online.
Teigen’s tweet further read, “It makes me really happy that by @tyrabanks and I sharing our stories and struggles, a lot of you feel like you can do the same and not feel ashamed!”
 19, 2015 8:50 pm
